Package peersim.bittorrent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitfieldMsg
    This class is a SimpleMsg and represents the bitfield message.
    BitTorrent
    This is the class that implements the BitTorrent module for Peersim
    BTObserver
    This Control provides a way to keep track of some parameters of the BitTorrent network.
    IntMsg
    This class is a SimpleMsg and acts as a container for a message that uses only an integer value.
    NetworkDynamics
    This Control can change the size of networks by adding and removing nodes.
    NetworkInitializer
    This Control ...
    NodeInitializer
    This class provides a way to initialize a single node of the network.
    PeerSetMsg
    This class is a SimpleMsg and represents the peerset message used by the tracker to send to the peers a list of neighbors.
    SimpleEvent
    This class defines a simple event.
    SimpleMsg
    This class defines a simple message.
